title: 区块错误 玩家到指定地点就崩
author: 断脊之犬

replies.author: ffxh
replies.txt_content:
解决方法1.用区块计算工具，计算出哪个区块，删掉就好了
方法二：服务器目录config/forge/
<div class="blockcode"><blockquote>    B:removeErroringEntities=true

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=true复制代码

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
config/Forge.cfg
两个remove打头的项都设置为true
一个是错误实体 一个是错误方块

最简单做法：重置该地图
